remarks: The complex conjugate of an inner product reverses its arguments. Equation I1 of [Ponnusamy] p. 362.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ipcl.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
ipcl.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
dipcj $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( * ` ( A P B ) ) = ( B P A ) ) $.
